entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and afternoon. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 10:45 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
